catalog_info.title: Advanced Russian for Academic and Professional Communication
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Russian 113, 114, or permission of the instructor.
catalog_info.description: Emphasis on close reading and stylistic analysis of the Russian language with continued development of grammatical, sociolinguistic, strategic, and discourse competencies at an advanced level. Emphasis on reading with considerable practice in speaking, presenting, and writing for professional and academic purposes.
